sections.title: 1. Introduction
sections.content:
Assam down town University (“AdtU”, “we”, “our”, “us”) is committed to protecting the privacy and personal data of users accessing the AdtU Bus Services platform (“System”, “Service”).

This Privacy Policy explains how personal information is collected, used, stored, shared, and protected when users interact with the Service. By using the Service, you consent to the practices described in this Policy.

sections.title: 2. Information We Collect
sections.content:
We may collect and process the following categories of information depending on user role:

a. Personal Identification Information
Full name
University ID / Employee ID
Date of birth
Contact details (phone number, email address)
Profile photograph (if uploaded)

b. Academic and Employment Information
Enrollment details (for students)
Role and designation (student, driver, moderator, administrator)
Departmental or route assignments

c. Transport and Usage Data
Bus assignments and route information
Trip participation and usage history
Digital bus pass status and validity
Check-in / validation records

d. Payment Information
Transaction references and payment status
Renewal history

Note: Sensitive payment details (card numbers, UPI credentials, etc.) are processed by authorized third-party payment gateways and are not stored by AdtU.

e. Technical Information
Device and browser metadata
IP address (for security and audit purposes)
System logs and activity timestamps

sections.title: 3. Purpose of Data Collection
sections.content:
Personal data is collected and used solely for legitimate institutional purposes, including:

Managing bus allocations, routes, and driver assignments
Issuing and validating digital bus passes
Processing payments and renewals
Enforcing access control and eligibility rules
Sending system notifications and alerts
Monitoring system performance and security
Fulfilling administrative, legal, and audit requirements

sections.title: 4. Legal Basis for Processing
sections.content:
We process personal data based on one or more of the following grounds:

User consent
Performance of institutional services
Compliance with legal or regulatory obligations
Legitimate interests of the university in operating secure transport systems

sections.title: 5. Data Storage and Retention
sections.content:
All data is stored securely using cloud-based infrastructure with controlled access

Personal data is retained only for as long as necessary to fulfill its intended purpose

Upon completion of academic tenure or termination of access, relevant data may be archived or anonymized in accordance with institutional policies

sections.title: 6. Data Sharing and Disclosure
sections.content:
We do not sell or commercially share user data.

Data may be shared only:

With authorized university departments for operational needs

With service providers (such as payment gateways or cloud services) strictly for service delivery

When required by law, regulation, or judicial authority

All such sharing is governed by confidentiality and data protection obligations.

sections.title: 7. Security Measures
sections.content:
AdtU implements reasonable technical and organizational safeguards to protect personal data, including:

Role-based access control
Authentication and authorization mechanisms
Activity logging and monitoring
Secure communication protocols

Despite best efforts, no system can guarantee absolute security. Users are advised to safeguard their credentials and report suspicious activity promptly.

sections.title: 8. User Rights
sections.content:
Subject to applicable laws, users have the right to:

Access their personal data
Request correction of inaccurate or outdated information
Request restriction or deletion of data where applicable
Withdraw consent where processing is consent-based

Requests may be subject to verification and institutional approval.

sections.title: 9. Cookies and Tracking
sections.content:
The Service may use essential cookies or local storage mechanisms to:

Maintain session state
Improve system usability
Enhance security

No third-party advertising or behavioral tracking cookies are used.

sections.title: 10. Children’s Privacy
sections.content: The Service is intended for university-affiliated users only. It is not designed for individuals below the age required for higher education enrollment. No knowingly collected data from minors is retained.

sections.title: 11. Policy Updates
sections.content:
This Privacy Policy may be updated periodically to reflect changes in technology, law, or institutional practices. Continued use of the Service after updates constitutes acceptance of the revised Policy.

Users are encouraged to review this page regularly.

sections.title: 12. Contact Information
sections.content:
For questions, concerns, or requests related to this Privacy Policy or personal data handling, users may contact the university’s Transport or IT Department through official communication channels.

By using AdtU Bus Services, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this Privacy Policy and agree to its terms.
